H0.text: Sheikh Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa is the reigning monarch of what country. Qatar

H1.text: Sheikh Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa is the reigning monarch of what country. Oman

H2.text: Sheikh Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa is the reigning monarch of what country. Saudi Arabia

H3.text: Sheikh Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa is the reigning monarch of what country. Bahrein

A4.text: Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa has been the ruler of Bahrain since 1999.

A5.text: The king was invited by the British court to the wedding of Prince William, but declined amidst protests by human rights activists, who had pledged to disrupt his stay in Britain because of his violent response to demonstrators.

A6.text: Generational change and elite-driven reforms in the Kingdom of Bahrain.

A8.text: Bahrain is a semi-constitutional monarchy headed by King Shaikh Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa
